content.rendered:
your comfort zone,
created by us

Explore the charm of Saigon to your heart’s content. Bare will take care of the rest: from comfy sheets, high-speed internet to freshly made coffee every morning.

available room

BARE CHIC ONE – THREE
12/18 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, D1, HCMC

Bare Chic are a chain of mignon-cute apartments that may hide in an old picturesque building or a townhouse. The architectural characteristics that embody Saigon. At the heart of an eventful Saigon. Where a leisure walk of less than 10 minutes may bring you to a promenade by a peaceful river under a contiguous tree canopy, to the nearby Saigon Zoo and Botanical Gardens.

2 guests / 1 beds / 1 bathroom
Previous
Next

BARE INDOCHINE
12/18 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, D1, HCMC

Bare is a new friend, but an approachable one. Its palette recalls the Indochine-styled living space of Saigon in past decades. A grey blue window with shining glass boxes. And now sunlight filters through the shutters and onto the pleasant green wall.
All furniture is carefully handpicked to combine nostalgic details with modern accentuation. You can cook yourself a square meal on the jet-black stone oven, simple yet convenient. Lay the table under the warm yellow light of the improvised paper chandelier.

2 guests / 1 beds / 1 bathroom
Previous
Next

BARE HAN
169/14 Tran Phu, Hai Chau, Da Nang City

Bare Han – subsidiary of the Bare Boutique Stays – seeks out to reinvent the experience of belonging. Bare Han is located on Tran Phu Street, within walking distance to Han Market and Han River; convenient for transit to popular recreational, cuisine, and cultural venues. Each floor at Bare Han only accommodates one apartment. Upon entering, you will experience the personable emotions of a place you’d easily call home. And in that place, modern interiors bring along comfort and relaxation.

2 guests / 1 beds / 1 bathroom
Previous
Next

BARE HYPHEN ONE – THREE
29A/18 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, D1, HCMC

Rooting from its personal stories, Bare Hyphen moves on to narrate a new chapter intertwining the past and the presence, the classic and the modern, yesterday and now. The past carries graceful recollections and the presence offers youthful charisma. The classic and the modern blends in harmony to create a cozy yet comfortable Bare Hyphen. The highlight of Bare Hyphen lies in the way every of its pieces of furniture combines with one another gracefully yet concisely as a Haiku poem. Materials made from wood, polished stones, and champagne gold stainless steel, were chosen to bring about a dominant unity of aesthetics, evocations, and interior vibes.

2 guests / 1 beds / 1 bathroom
Previous
Next
